list.description: These are single file plugins that let you do various things.

items.title: Autopoke
items.description: This automatically responds to pokes on Facebook for you.

items.title: XKCD News Substitutions
items.description: This does some word substitutions that make news stories more fun to read.

items.title: No Typing Notifications
items.description: This gives you a more stealthy Facebook chat experience by blocking people from seeing the "seen" and "typing" notifications.
